attributes.action: King Charles To dissolve the English Parliament and call a general election.
attributes.additional_details: Call on the king to call a General election for the sake of the people of the uk
attributes.background: The UK Government needs to be forced into a general election. We as a country cannot survive 4 more years of this government.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions that request actions by the King, as these are decisions for the crown, and not the Government or House of Commons.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
